TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AudioConfig extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class AudioConfig Implements IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents audio input or output configuration. Audio input can be from a microphone, file, or input stream. Audio output can be to a speaker, audio file output in WAV format, or output stream.
